doc.field: Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello

This series contains documents pertaining to George Bugliarello's term as Chancellor (1994-2003) and President Emeritus (2003-2011) of Polytechnic and includes correspondence, memoranda, pamphlets, promotional material, and professional agendas and calendars documenting administrative functions, the development of the Center of Technology and Merchandising, the proposal for an Urban Sustainability Center, and the organization of the Leadership Seminar Series.
Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello
